text:
I am trying to upload a template with `templateType: email` and the CLI is delivering the following error:
```[ERROR] Couldn't execute the request because the access key for h2dev [standard] (xxxxxxx) is missing required scopes. To update scopes, run `hs auth`. Then deactivate the existing key and generate a new one that includes the missing scopes.```
I followed the instructions and run `hs auth`, deactivated the existing key and generating a new one with all scopes but it still delivers the same error. Has anyone seen this before?
